item_category: Stylish and easy to use, the Doro 6040 has everything you need for everyday calling, messaging and sharing photos with family and friends. The clamshell design prevents against accidental key presses and lets you answer and end calls with a simple flip. And you can feel safer with the direct help when using the Assistance Button by Doro.
